name: Weather Dashboard
description: Search current and forecasted weather conditions for cities around the world using the 'OpenWeatherMap' API.

name: GoSee
description: Bootcamp group project / full stack application where users can sign up and view or post things about their travel destinations.

name: Code Quiz
description: Test your knowledge in different categories using this Code Quiz. Race against the clock and try to answer all questions correctly!

name: Google Books Search
description: A full stack application that allows you to search the Google Books API, and save or remove your books in a MongoDB database.

name: Cycle Tracker
description: Cycle Tracker allows users to enter their ride stats to a database and display or modify their entries using an interactive table.

name: Movies & Stars
description: Users can search for their favorite movies, actors or check out the Top 250 Movies using the IMDb API. Built using React, NodeJS and IMDb API.
